attributes.action: scrap plans to collect rubbish once every two weeks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many councils have decided to only collect rubbish every two weeks.

This is extremely unhygenic, it will cause foul smells and insect infestations.

Our council tax has sky-rocketed in recent years and yet our quality of service has become abysmal.

It's time we took action

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
